channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Crumbling concrete on base of bollard, 10th July
item.description:
The bollard outside my home has been hit by delivery vehicle,so has loosened concrete at base of post,was reporting it as don't know how actually loose it is, outside 60 Paygrove Lane Longlevens Gloucester GL2OBE
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paygrove Lane, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low branches over footpath, 10th July
item.description:
There are several trees along Grovefield Way and outside of B&Q that have low branches, making pedestrians walk on the outside of the pavement, in the path of cyclists. It is worse when it is windy and the branches are pushed even lower. There are also places where the hedge needs cutting back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grovefield Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More dog fouling outside school, 10th July
item.description:
Dog poo near the school on pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More pink e-scooters in Noverton Prestbury, 10th July
item.description:
1 x pink e-scooter by play park in Desert Orchid Road 1 x pink e-scooter outside no. 34 Noverton Lane 4 scooters were collected yesterday morning and already there are 2 more.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Desert Orchid Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cones awaiting collection, 10th July
item.description:
2 cones on the triangle of green grass discarded after road closure signage removed need to be collected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Discarded cones, 10th July
item.description:
Reports have been closed BUT THE CONES ARE STILL THERE WAITING FOR COLLECTION. This is a disgrace! Grass is growing out the top of the one on the junction & the other is chucked in the hedge which is a blatant disregard for the environment.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
